name: Halo Song
description: A captivating song fills the air around you. When an enemy creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a CHA saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 1d8 + MOVE fairy damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 3d8 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
